alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 15 at 1:57AM CDT until June 15 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 301, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ARKANSAS ASHLEY CHICOT IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA EAST CARROLL MOREHOUSE WEST CARROLL IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 33 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW HINDS HOLMES HUMPHREYS LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT SMITH YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CLARKE JASPER KEMPER LAUDERDALE NESHOBA NEWTON NOXUBEE WINSTON IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA LEFLORE MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN NORTHEAST MISSISSIPPI CLAY LOWNDES OKTIBBEHA IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI BOLIVAR SUNFLOWER WASHINGTON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, ANGUILLA, BASTROP, BAY SPRINGS, BELZONI, BRANDON, BROOKSVILLE, CANTON, CARROLLTON, CARTHAGE, CLEVELAND, COLUMBUS, CONEHATTA, CROSSETT, DE KALB, DECATUR, DERMOTT, DURANT, EPPS, EUDORA, EUPORA, FOREST, GOODMAN, GREENVILLE, GREENWOOD, GRENADA, HAMBURG, HEIDELBERG, INDIANOLA, ISOLA, JACKSON, KOSCIUSKO, LAKE PROVIDENCE, LAKE VILLAGE, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MACON, MADISON, MATHISTON, MAYERSVILLE, MERIDIAN, MORTON, NEWTON, NORTH CARROLLTON, NORTH CROSSETT, OAK GROVE, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, QUITMAN, RALEIGH, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, RULEVILLE, SCOOBA, SHUBUTA, STARKVILLE, STONEWALL, TAYLORSVILLE, TCHULA, UNION, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, WEIR, WEST CROSSETT, WEST POINT, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
